New & Noteworthy

Version 0.1.8 - June 5, 2006

  • Added Listener: Metadata Tag (also bug 144761)
  • org.mozilla.rhino as a separtate plug-in that exports all packages (bugs 131360 & 145034)

Version 0.1.7 - May 28, 2006

  • Added the Scripts View
  • Changed script filenames to *.js to enable the default Javascript editor
  • The class paths of all referenced DOMs are used to form the class path of the script, thus allowing scripts to directly (using Packages.foo.bar) to directly access all public classes available to the DOMs.
  • Added the key binding (Key:) to the script metadata. (Thanks to Channing Walton via bug 143456)

Version 0.1.5 - March 3, 2006

  • Renamed org.eclipse.eclipsemonkey.standarddoms to org.eclipse.dash.doms
  • Added accelerator control-alt-M to re-run last run script.
